text:
Everyone's favorite maybe-couple Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas have been setting the Internet ablaze these past few days. They just spent the last week in India, where they reportedly attended a pre-engagement party together—and looked gorgeous in the process. Now they're in Brazil, where Jonas just wrapped his performance at the VillaMix Festival. Of course Chopra was in the audience, and she posted something to her Instagram Stories last night that all but confirms she's Jonas' biggest fan.

The Quantico actress uploaded a video of Jonas on stage, presumably after he finished a song, and she captioned it "Him 😍." To drive the point home further, Chopra's video zooms closer and closer onto Jonas' face. (Side note: I wonder what her favorite Nick song is?)

See, guys? Chopra and Jonas are just like any other maybe-couple. They cheer each other on at work, pose for pictures together, and hide from dozens of paparazzi—ya know, normal people stuff.

Speaking of, there are a few cute pics from Jonas and Chopra's past week together: The first is from the night of Akash Ambani's pre-engagement party. The second is a paparazzi shot of them together in Mumbai.

Getty Images
title: Priyanka Chopra Was Definitely Nick Jonas' Biggest Fan at His Concert Last Night

meta_data.author: Condé Nast
meta_data.description: Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas, everyone's favorite maybe-couple, are currently living it up in India, where Chopra attended Jonas' concert.

og.title: Priyanka Chopra Was Definitely Nick Jonas' Biggest Fan at His Concert Last Night
